org.objectweb.celtix
Interface BusEventCache

public interface BusEventCache

Caches all bus events that do not have a listener associated with them. The bus events will be stored until the cache limit is reached. After reaching the cache size, events will be discarded using first in, first out semantics.

Method Summary

          Add the BusEvent to the cache.

Method Detail

addEvent

void addEvent(BusEvent e)
Add the BusEvent to the cache. If the maximum size of the cache is reached, the first BusEvent added will be removed from the cache(FIFO)

Parameters:
e - The BusEvent to be added to the cache.

flushEvents

java.util.List<BusEvent> flushEvents()
Flushes the cache of all the BusEvent.

Returns:
List Containing all the BusEvents cached.

flushEvents

java.util.List<BusEvent> flushEvents(java.lang.String eventID)
Flushes the BusEvent from the cache matching the event id.

Parameters:
eventID - The unique event id that identifies the BusEvent.
Returns:
List Containing all BusEvents matching the event id.

flushEvents

java.util.List<BusEvent> flushEvents(java.lang.Class<?> eventClass)
Flushes the BusEvent from the cache matching the event class.

Parameters:
eventClass - The class of the event that identifies the BusEvent.
Returns:
List Containing all BusEvents matching the event class.

getEvents

java.util.List<BusEvent> getEvents()
Returns all the bus events. This method doesn't remove the events from the cache.

Returns:
List Containing all bus events stored in the cache.

getEvents

java.util.List<BusEvent> getEvents(java.lang.String eventID)
Returns all the bus events matching the event id. This method doesn't remove the events from the cache.

Parameters:
eventID - Unique bus event id that identifies the BusEvent.
Returns:
List Containing all of BusEvents matching the event id.

setCacheSize

void setCacheSize(int size)
Sets the cache size. This method can be used to dynamically change the cache size from the configured size.

Parameters:
size - Indicates the new size of the cache.
